alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 10:15PM MST until December 19 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST /8 AM PST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...A mix of snow, sleet, and freezing rain. Less than a tenth of an inch of ice expected. Snow accumulations less than one inch expected. * WHERE...Harney County and Malheur County in southeast Oregon. The Lower Treasure Valley in southeast Oregon and southwest Idaho. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST /8 AM PST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially for the morning commute. Sidewalks may become ice-covered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures in the low elevations will gradually rise above freezing throughout the early morning hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
